metadata.title: CVE-2016-0663 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.7.10 and earlier allows localusers to affect availability via vectors related to Performance Schema.

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
